name: dA Eclipse but friendlier
description: A few tweaks to make Eclipse more bearable
additional_info:
Things that changed:

- rounded corners on images, comments and other places to make the layout softer
- smaller font on comments/journals
- smaller headers on profiles
- image thumbnails are scaled down so nothing gets cut off
- remove buttons in feedback and watch menus are always visible for easier access
- header and menu bars are smaller and take up less space
- image titles always visible on thumbnails

I haven't checked all pages, so if there's one that I missed or if you discover grave errors somewhere, please let me know.
Also, this should in theory work for all color themes, but I only checked the classic one. Let me know if there are issues!
